text.author: Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia
text.title: Emperor Norton
text.summary: Joshua Norton was an eccentric resident of San Francisco who proclaimed himself Emperor of the United States in the second half of the 19th Century, and came to be known as Emperor Norton.
